verses.name: 1 Corinthians 15:32
verses.text: If after the manner of men I have fought with beasts at Ephesus, what advantageth it me, if the dead rise not? let us eat and drink; for to morrow we die.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 15:33
verses.text: Be not deceived: evil communications corrupt good manners.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 15:34
verses.text: Awake to righteousness, and sin not; for some have not the knowledge of God: I speak this to your shame.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 15:35
verses.text: But some man will say, How are the dead raised up? and with what body do they come?

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 15:36
verses.text: Thou fool, that which thou sowest is not quickened, except it die:
